SELECT st.id positionId,st.v position,s.alais,s.limit_alarm upper_level1,s.limit_power,s.limit_repower,s.floor_alarm floor_level1, s.floor_power,s.floor_repower,ar.areaname,s.devlinkId,s.floorDevlinkId,st2.k unit FROM t_sensor s LEFT JOIN t_substation sub ON s.station = sub.id LEFT JOIN t_static st ON st.id = s.sensor_position LEFT JOIN t_env_area ar ON ar.id = s.area_id LEFT JOIN t_static st2 ON st2.id = s.sensor_type WHERE s.control < 3 and
(ipaddr = #{it.ip} AND sensorId = #{it.devid})

SELECT st.id positionId,st.v position,s.alais,ar.areaname,s.sensor_type type,s.sensorId devid,sub.ipaddr ip,s.power_scope FROM t_switch_sensor s LEFT JOIN t_substation sub ON s.station = sub.id LEFT JOIN t_static st ON st.id = s.sensor_position LEFT JOIN t_env_area ar ON ar.id = s.area_id WHERE s.control < 3 and
(ipaddr = #{it.ip} AND sensorId = #{it.devid})

SELECT st.v position,s.alais,0 limit_alarm,0 limit_power,0 limit_repower,0 floor_alarm,0 floor_power,0 floor_repower,ar.areaname,s.sensor_type type FROM t_switch_sensor s LEFT JOIN t_substation sub ON s.station = sub.id LEFT JOIN t_static st ON st.id = s.sensor_position LEFT JOIN t_env_area ar ON ar.id = s.area_id WHERE s.control < 3 and
(ipaddr = #{it.ip} AND sensorId = #{it.devid})
union all SELECT st.v position,s.alais,s.limit_alarm upper_level1,s.limit_power,s.limit_repower,s.floor_alarm floor_level1,s.floor_power,s.floor_repower,ar.areaname,s.sensor_type type FROM t_sensor s LEFT JOIN t_substation sub ON s.station = sub.id LEFT JOIN t_static st ON st.id = s.sensor_position LEFT JOIN t_env_area ar ON ar.id = s.area_id WHERE s.control < 3 and
(ipaddr = #{it.ip} AND sensorId = #{it.devid})

SELECT sensor_id,startId,endId,type,`status`,ip,DATE_FORMAT(startTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') startTime, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(endTime,NOW()),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') endTime,measure,DATE_FORMAT(measuretime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') measuretime FROM t_analoginfo_query WHERE sensor_id = #{0} AND ip = #{1} AND startTime <= #{3} and IFNULL(endTime,NOW()) >= #{2}

SELECT ss.id,sensor_id,startId,endId,aq.type,`status`,ip,DATE_FORMAT(startTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') startTime, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(endTime,NOW()),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') endTime,measure,DATE_FORMAT(measuretime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') measuretime FROM t_switch_sensor ss LEFT JOIN t_substation sub ON ss.station = sub.id LEFT JOIN t_analoginfo_query aq ON aq.sensor_id = ss.sensorId AND sub.ipaddr = aq.ip
aq.status = 1 and
(ss.id = #{it.id} and startTime <= #{it.endTime} and IFNULL(endTime,NOW()) >= #{it.startTime})
